title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 36.6 - Certificate made by parent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 36.6 - Certificate made by parent

State Regulations

If the physician or midwife who attended the birth has died or cannot be located, or if the birth was not attended professionally, the certificate of birth shall be made by one of the parents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
36.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
